mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.password_hash AS passwordHash, u.created_at as createdAt, r.id AS idRole, r.name AS nameRole FROM app_user AS u INNER JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN app_role AS r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE r.name != 'ADMIN'

SELECT DISTINCT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.password_hash as passwordHash, u.created_at as createdAt, r.id as idRole, r.name as nameRole, p.id as idProject, p.name as projectName, p.description, p.created_at as createdAtProject FROM app_user u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN app_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN user_project up ON u.id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN project p ON up.project_id = p.id WHERE p.id = #{projectId}

SELECT DISTINCT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.password_hash as passwordHash, u.created_at as createdAt, r.id as idRole, r.name as nameRole, p.id as idProject, p.name as projectName, p.description, p.created_at as createdAtProject FROM app_user u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN app_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN user_project up ON u.id = up.user_id LEFT JOIN project p ON up.project_id = p.id WHERE u.email = #{email}

SELECT DISTINCT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.password_hash as passwordHash, u.created_at as createdAt, r.id as idRole, r.name as nameRole FROM app_user u INNER JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN app_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id
WHERE u.id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_user (id, name, email, password_hash) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{passwordHash});
-- insert categoryId and movieId to joining table INSERT INTO user_role (user_id, role_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roleId})
mapper.delete: -- executes delete query DELETE FROM user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}
-- executes delete query DELETE FROM app_user WHERE id = #{userId}
